channel.title: Rsps Solar718. Eco/Pvm based with pvp system! Vps hosted 24/7
channel.description:
[size=18pt]Solar718 is a new Pvm based rsps. But it also has a pvp system for those who like pking. Fully Working Grand Exchange![/size]
[size=18pt]Spirit Tree Teleport System[/size] [size=18pt]Mini Games[/size] [size=14pt]Soulwars Duel Arena Pest Control 62 waves Figth Caves Full Fight Kiln Dominion Tower With Golioths etc for Rewards Fully Working Castle Wars Fighters Guild[/size] [size=18pt]Bosses[/size] [size=14pt]All Godwars bosses Corporeal Beast Kalphite Queen with Drygore drops Fully Coded QBD With royal C Bow parts Tormented Demons Bork Barrel chest Dagganoth kings with ring drops and Potion drop to make Ring(i)[/size] [size=18pt]Skilling[/size] [size=14pt]All skills Trainable Multiple teleports for every skill Runespan Two Dungeoneering methods Trimmed Comp cape stand Untrimmed Comp cape stand[/size] [size=18pt] Donator stuff[/size] [size=14pt] Donor store for each donator rank Donator box (chance at rares) Donator zone with better thieving stall Crystal Key system (chance at pvp gear) Vestas etc. Most Eoc items up to date[/size] [size=24pt]More Content coming soon!!![/size] [size=18pt]Video And pictures Coming soon![/size] [size=18pt]No players or staff yet, Official Release is now[/size] [size=18pt]Owner is Bluemachine Co-Owner is Apollo[/size] [size=24pt]Download LINK https://www.dropbox.com/s/oyz1zvvpzr1cgry/Solar718.jar?dl=0/size] [size=24pt]Forum LINk Coming Soon!![/size]
[size=24pt]Media[/size] http://i.imgur.com/gdpCNWl.png http://i.imgur.com/Zp77AHj.jpg http://i.imgur.com/mL1TmRl.jpg http://i.imgur.com/StMSh6F.jpg http://i.imgur.com/QvR5RLB.jpg http://i.imgur.com/BBeoqTB.jpg http://i.imgur.com/leaMZAA.png http://i.imgur.com/horAfZs.jpg http://i.imgur.com/NmahcLK.png http://i.imgur.com/SEySc6q.jpg

item.title: Rsps Solar718. Eco/Pvm based with pvp system! Vps hosted 24/7
item.dc:creator: @bluemachine bluemachine
item.description:
@bluemachine wrote:

[size=18pt]Solar718 is a new Pvm based rsps. But it also has a pvp system for those who like pking. Fully Working Grand Exchange![/size]

[size=18pt]Spirit Tree Teleport System[/size]
[size=18pt]Mini Games[/size]
[size=14pt]Soulwars
Duel Arena
Pest Control
62 waves Figth Caves
Full Fight Kiln
Dominion Tower With Golioths etc for Rewards
Fully Working Castle Wars
Fighters Guild[/size]
[size=18pt]Bosses[/size]
[size=14pt]All Godwars bosses
Corporeal Beast
Kalphite Queen with Drygore drops
Fully Coded QBD With royal C Bow parts
Tormented Demons
Bork
Barrel chest
Dagganoth kings with ring drops and Potion drop to make Ring(i)[/size]
[size=18pt]Skilling[/size]
[size=14pt]All skills Trainable
Multiple teleports for every skill
Runespan
Two Dungeoneering methods
Trimmed Comp cape stand
Untrimmed Comp cape stand[/size]
[size=18pt] Donator stuff[/size]
[size=14pt] Donor store for each donator rank
Donator box (chance at rares)
Donator zone with better thieving stall
Crystal Key system (chance at pvp gear) Vestas etc.
Most Eoc items up to date[/size]
[size=24pt]More Content coming soon!!![/size]
[size=18pt]Video And pictures Coming soon![/size]
[size=18pt]No players or staff yet, Official Release is now[/size]
[size=18pt]Owner is Bluemachine
Co-Owner is Apollo[/size]
[size=24pt]Download LINK https://www.dropbox.com/s/oyz1zvvpzr1cgry/Solar718.jar?dl=0/size]
